attributes.action: MPs should not be allowed to get a taxpayer-funded iPad
attributes.additional_details:
In these times of austerity surely Members of Parliament should think twice before spending more public money in such wasteful ways. Perhaps if politicians' really want an Ipad they could afford to buy one out of their own pocket, they earn enough.

Politicians are keen for every one else to tighten their belts, perhaps it's time for politicians to lead by example.
